Package wibiral.tim.javachr

Class ConstraintHandler

java.lang.Object
wibiral.tim.javachr.ConstraintHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleHandler
public abstract class ConstraintHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Is used to apply rules to the Constraints.

    • setTrace

      public abstract boolean setTrace​(Tracer tracer)
      Switch to turn tracing on and of.
      Parameters:
      tracer - The Tracer you want to use.
      Returns:
      True if tracing is on after calling this method, false if not.

    • solve

      public abstract ConstraintStore solve​(ConstraintStore store)
      Applies the given rules to the given constraints. The computation of the solution happens in-place.
      Parameters:
      store - A ConstraintStore with the constraints of the problem set.
      Returns:
      A ConstraintStore with the constraints of the solution set.

    • solve

      public <T> ConstraintStore solve​(T... values)
      Just like solve(ConstraintStore store) but accepts an array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the objects.
      Parameters:
      values - Some objects to which the rules should be applied.
      Returns:
      The ConstraintStore with the constraints of the solution set.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:
      true if no rules are set for this handler, otherwise false.

    • addRule

      public boolean addRule​(Rule rule)
      Adds a rule to the constraint handler.
      Parameters:
      rule - The rule to add.
      Returns:
      True if successfully added.

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
